--- bad_insert.sql
insert foo (foo, bar, baz)
vales (1, 2, 3),
      (4, 5, 6)
--- Error
syntax error: testdata/input/dml/bad_insert.sql:2:1: expected beginning of simple query "(", SELECT, FROM, but: "vales"

  2:  vales (1, 2, 3),
      ^~~~~


--- AST
&ast.Insert{
  TableName: &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 7,
    NameEnd: 10,
    Name:    "foo",
  },
  Columns: []*ast.Ident{
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 12,
      NameEnd: 15,
      Name:    "foo",
    },
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 17,
      NameEnd: 20,
      Name:    "bar",
    },
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 22,
      NameEnd: 25,
      Name:    "baz",
    },
  },
  Input: &ast.SubQueryInput{
    Query: &ast.BadNode{
      NodePos: 27,
      NodeEnd: 59,
      Raw:     "vales (1, 2, 3),\n      (4, 5, 6)",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
INSERT INTO foo (foo, bar, baz) vales (1, 2, 3),
      (4, 5, 6)
